message.content:
1. Intra-articular morphine is an option for treatment.
2. Intra-articular steroid is another treatment option.
3. Intra-articular morphine may be a better option than intra-articular steroid.
4. Intra-articular morphine has lesser side effects than intra-articular steroid.

messages.content:
Statement: Intra-articular morphine is possibly a better option than intra-articular steroid as it has lesser side effects.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
